name: kitty-wiki
author: Mark Watson
description: A website for cat lovers to review the different breeds of domestic cats and their characteristics.

scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client
